messages.subject: about Unschooling Down Under?
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Are there any Aussie unschoolers in this e-group? If there are, could you fill me in about any important info on home-/un-schooling in Australia? We ll be
messages.messageBody:
-=-Are there any Aussie unschoolers in this e-group? If there are, could
you fill me in about any important info on home-/un-schooling in
Australia? We'll be moving there in a couple years, and we plan to
still live the unschooling life. Thanks in advance!-=-

Best: write on the side to Nichol at
mommycore98@...

If there are better Australian links, maybe send those to her and to
me too, so I can keep them on my site.

I'd like to keep this list general and international--meaning NOT
about particular jurisdictions. Thanks.

http://homeschoolaustralia.beverleypaine.com/

I have several links in the left column on this page:
http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingotherwise

Sandra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Unschooling Down Under?
messages.msgSnippet: Are there any Aussie unschoolers in this e-group?  If there are, could you fill me in about any important info on home-/un-schooling in Australia?  We ll be
messages.messageBody:
Are there any Aussie unschoolers in this e-group? If there are, could
you fill me in about any important info on home-/un-schooling in
Australia? We'll be moving there in a couple years, and we plan to
still live the unschooling life. Thanks in advance!
